mapper.select: select a.*, b.dept_name as orgName, d.real_name as userName, c.name as levelName from assets_inventory a left join sys_dept b on a.org_id = b.sys_dept_id left join assets_level c on c.assets_level_id = a.level_id left join sys_user d on d.sys_user_id = a.user_id

select a.*, b.dept_name as orgName, d.real_name as userName, c.name as levelName from assets_inventory a left join sys_dept b on a.org_id = b.sys_dept_id left join assets_level c on c.assets_level_id = a.level_id left join sys_user d on d.sys_user_id = a.user_id where a.id = #{id}
